tokens: And when Hallion worked a game that involved the [OBJ-ORGANIZATION] [SUBJ-ORGANIZATION] Boston [/SUBJ-ORGANIZATION] Red Sox [/OBJ-ORGANIZATION] , Terry Francona , the Boston manager , who was the manager of the Phillies when Hallion worked in the N.L. , sent word to Hallion through another member of the umpiring crew . ''
